name: MemoCode
resume: A note-taking web application to store all your information in a unique and centralized space.
description: MemoCode is a full-stack web application built with React, Express, Node and MongoDB. It allows you to create notes, read, edit and delete them as long as you like. It uses a clean and responsive interface.

name: StatMind
resume: A web application designed to track daily emotions and visualize personal trends through clear statistics and charts.
description: StatMind is a full-stack web application built with React, Express, Node, and MongoDB. It allows users to log their daily emotions and monitor their well-being over time. Thanks to statistics tables, users can easily identify patterns, better understand their emotional health, and keep track of their emotions daily life.
